explains: v. 重建；使复原（rebuild 的 ing 形式）

sentences.en: A lot of rebuilding took place in the aftermath of the war.
sentences.cn: 战后进行了大量的重建工作。

sentences.en: Nothing daunted, the people set about rebuilding their homes.
sentences.cn: 人们毫不气馁，又开始重建家园。

sentences.en: After the earthquake, the people set about rebuilding their homes.
sentences.cn: 地震过后，人们开始重建家园。
